title: XSS in Myshopify Admin Site in DISCOUNTS

profile.name: Shopify
profile.about: Shopify is a multi-channel commerce platform that helps people sell online, in-store, and everywhere in between.

vulnerability_information: POC 1. Go to Customers and add a new search group named ">

activities.message: Attached are the files referenced above

In order to make the 1st step easier, to create a new search group, you go to ***Customers***, and on ***Filter Customers*** you write **XSS** and a "Save this search" will come up. You save this as new search by the name **">img src=x onerror=prompt('XSS')** 
You can the proceed with step 2!

Let me know if you need anything else!

Thanks!

In order to make the 2nd step easier, I attach the image creatediscount.png

PS: Please note that although the currency in the Store is in EURO the Take field is hardcored in $ which should be corrected! (Fear not, the amount discounted will be in euro!)

Thanks again!
Any update on the XSS issue?
@clayton XSS still active after 6 days of reporting! Please check!
Sorry I asked too many times! I will let you check it since it is active!

Thank you for your report and sorry for the delay; we've had a lot of submissions to process.

We have reproduced this bug and we're currently working on a fix.
@clayton Everything seems fixed! That was fast! Great!!!
Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify. As you noted, this issue has been resolved.
